subject: Your Mobidictum speaker bio + form by 15 September
text:
Hi Ali,

We have recently introduced a feature to support the conference production: short bios generated from public sources with the help of an AI tool. These bios are meant only as a starting point, not a final source of truth, and we know creative technology comes with its caveats.

That is why we would love your feedback on whether this draft helps streamline the process.

Proposed short bio:
Ali Kodal is the Co-Founder and Chief Operating Officer of Brew Games, a studio specializing in hyper-casual and hybrid-casual mobile games. He brings over a decade of experience in sales and marketing to the gaming industry, having served as a Sales Manager at PUBLIK Digital Agency and a Traffic Coordinator at Fox International Channels before starting Brew Games. At Brew Games, Ali oversees daily operations and growth strategy, leveraging his diverse background to drive the company’s success in the competitive mobile games market.

Next step:
Please complete the form by 15 September so we can prepare marketing materials and ensure every session receives the attention it deserves.
https://form.jotform.com/242603789142964

You can use the text as is, update it, or replace it with your own version.

Additional details
• Sessions run between 10:00 and 16:00. Exact time and stage will be shared later.
• Speaker tickets can be claimed using code speaker2025 on the conference page: https://mobidictum.com/events/mobidictum-conference-2025/
• Hotel discounts are listed on the event page.
• On 20 October we will host an Executive Mixer for Speakers and Executive ticket holders, and you are warmly invited.

Thank you in advance and looking forward to your input.

Best regards,
Serdar
Marketing Manager, Mobidictum

subject: Your Mobidictum speaker bio + form by 15 September
text:
Hi Görkem,

We have recently introduced a feature to support the conference production: short bios generated from public sources with the help of an AI tool. These bios are meant only as a starting point, not a final source of truth, and we know creative technology comes with its caveats.

That is why we would love your feedback on whether this draft helps streamline the process.

Proposed short bio:
Görkem Türk is the founding partner of Laton Ventures, the largest gaming- and apps-focused venture capital fund in Turkiye. Launched in February 2025, Laton closed its inaugural $50 million fund to support pre-seed and seed-stage gaming startups globally, with a strong emphasis on founders in Turkiye, the US, and Europe. Prior to founding Laton, Görkem spent six years as Industry Manager for Gaming, Apps & Startups at Google in Istanbul, where he led growth partnerships and ecosystem development in the gaming sector. Under Görkem’s leadership, Laton has invested in five early-stage companies within its first year—two of which have since secured Series A funding, including Grand Games, which raised $30 million in under nine months. Laton has also quickly risen to rank among the global top 10 most active early-stage gaming VCs.

Halil İbrahim Özdemir is the Founder and Managing Director of Leus Capital, a financial platform that provides mobile game and app studios with fast, collateral-free funding. Halil focuses on making the funding process faster and more accessible for developers, aiming to support sustainable growth across the mobile ecosystem.

Hussam Hammo is the founder and CEO of Tamatem Games, a Jordanian company that localises and publishes mobile games for Arabic-speaking gamers. (creators of PUBG). Under Hussam’s leadership, Tamatem grew rapidly, achieving a 105% annual revenue increase as of 2017, garnering over 38 million downloads, and gaining recognition from Apple as Best Game of the Year in Saudi Arabia, Egypt, and the UAE.

Marketing Manager, Mobidictum

subject: Your Mobidictum speaker bio + form by 15 September
text:
Hi Yalçın,

We have recently introduced a feature to support the conference production: short bios generated from public sources with the help of an AI tool. These bios are meant only as a starting point, not a final source of truth, and we know creative technology comes with its caveats.

That is why we would love your feedback on whether this draft helps streamline the process.

Proposed short bio:
Yalçın Özdemir is the Founder and CEO of AppNation, a leading Istanbul-based developer and publisher of AI-powered mobile apps, including Genie, Fotorama, and Arch.

Next step:
Please complete the form by 15 September so we can prepare marketing materials and ensure every session receives the attention it deserves.
https://form.jotform.com/242603789142964

You can use the text as is, update it, or replace it with your own version.

Additional details
• Sessions run between 10:00 and 16:00. Exact time and stage will be shared later.
• Speaker tickets can be claimed using code speaker2025 on the conference page: https://mobidictum.com/events/mobidictum-conference-2025/
• Hotel discounts are listed on the event page.
• On 20 October we will host an Executive Mixer for Speakers and Executive ticket holders, and you are warmly invited.

Thank you in advance and looking forward to your input.

Best regards,
Serdar
Marketing Manager, Mobidictum
